name: Alex Kidd in Shinobi World
description:
What do you get when you combine the two monumental Sega classics Alex
Kidd in Miracle World and Shinobi? Alex Kidd in Shinobi World of course!
Though never released in Japan, this game has it all: Alex Kidd,
kidnapped princesses, evil Dark Ninjas – and of course it’s all played
to a rockin’ remixed Shinobi sound track. Run, jump, swim and slash your
way through twelve stages, teeming with monstrous foes from the world of
Shinobi, and some more lighthearted ones from Alex Kidd. Just don’t let
the barracudas turn you into sushi!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
